Address.label: Address
Address.value: UNIT 517, LEVEL 5,INDEX TOWER, DIFC (DUBAI INTERNATIONAL FINANCIAL CENTER), DUBAI, United Arab Emirates

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Kyivstar Group operates Ukraine's leading digital operator, serving nearly 23 million mobile customers and over 1.1 million home internet fixed line customers as of June 30th, 2025. Kyivstar Group and its subsidiaries provide services across a wide range of mobile and fixed line technologies, including 4G, big data, cloud solutions, cybersecurity, digital TV, and more. VEON, together with Kyivstar Group, intends to invest USD 1 billion in Ukraine during 2023-2027, through social investments in infrastructure and technological development, charitable donations and strategic acquisitions. Kyivstar Group and its subsidiaries have been operating in Ukraine for more than 27 years. For more information, visit: www.kyivstar.ua.
